mapper.select: SELECT * FROM learning_sessions WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY started_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO learning_sessions (user_id, session_type, ai_article, theme, difficulty_preference, target_word_count, words_learned, words_correct, duration_seconds, started_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{sessionType}, #{aiArticle}, #{theme}, #{difficultyPreference}, #{targetWordCount}, 0, 0, 0, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE learning_sessions SET ai_article = #{aiArticle}, words_learned = #{wordsLearned}, words_correct = #{wordsCorrect}, duration_seconds = #{durationSeconds}, ended_at = #{endedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE learning_sessions SET words_learned = #{wordsLearned}, words_correct = #{wordsCorrect}, duration_seconds = #{durationSeconds}, ended_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
